General.Name: China Zheshang Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: China Zheshang Bank Co., Ltd. provides various commercial banking products and services in Mainland China. It operates through Corporate Banking, Retail Banking, and Treasury Business segments. The Corporate Banking segment offers a range of financial products and services, such as corporate loans and advances, trade financing services, deposit products, financial guarantees, debt instruments underwriting services, and various types of bank intermediary services for corporate customers, governments, and other institutions. The Retail Banking segment provides personal loans and advances, deposit products, financial management services, bank cards, and other retail banking services for individual customers. The Treasury Operations segment offers money market and repurchase transactions, debt instruments investments, equity instrument investments, proprietary financial derivatives business for proprietary trading or on behalf of customers, and financial products and services, as well as issues debt securities. China Zheshang Bank Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
